meanings.definition: A recording of moving visual images made digitally or on videotape.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching videos of cute animals online.
meanings.sent2: She borrowed a stack of videos from the library for the weekend.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks the videos of birds are real and tries to catch them.
meanings.sent4: The videos of the storm raging outside mirrored the chaos in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The videos of the waterfall were so clear, it felt like I could hear the water rushing.

meanings.definition: A movie or other piece of material recorded on videotape.
meanings.sent1: We watched old family videos during the reunion.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on classic movie videos.
meanings.sent3: The videos of the puppet show made us all laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His memories played like videos in his mind as he revisited the old house.
meanings.sent5: The videos of the concert captured the energy of the live performance perfectly.
